title: SEE ALL THE SKINS YOU OWN
body:
Often I use hextech crafting, and I get a lot of skins that I find cool/play worthy. I find myself in a pickle where I get the coolest skins and I never even knew that I had them. (had dunkmaster Darius) DIDN't know I had it until i took the 20 minutes of time to go through every single champion to see what skins I owned.

So my Idea is to just create a way to see all the skins you own in the summoners profile, it would save time, and imburse people to buy more skins and or play different things. I found so many skins that I didn't even know that I had, like Hextech annie. Thank you. :)

replies.body: They're trying to implement that feature in the new client afaik

How do you get hextech annie without knowing you have it.

This thread smells funny..
I was aiming for Soulstealer vayne, and i happened to pick it up along the way i believe. AS i was going fast that is.
why did u remake the same thread?
